title: Las Tortas del Abuelo
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Mexican
description: A 100% vegan restaurant serving food that is low in fat, low in salt, no preservatives, with a home-made taste. All food is made-in-house using the owner's grandfather's recipes, but adapting to vegan. Menu items include tacos, muffins, burritos, biscuits, burgers, cakes, water and made-to-order natural fruit juices, in addition to artisan, sweet bread. Other dishes are barbecued eggplant, slits creamed tofu sausage soy, soy steak, mushroom, portobello to herbed sausage, Papita with chorizo mushroom, among others. Specializes in the famous Grandpa's cakes. Located 20 meters from St Eloy Cavazos in back of the Super 7.
streetAddress: Calle Lomas de Tolteca 2401 A Colonia Lomas de Tolteca Cd, Nuevo Leon
